title: This better be a joke

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: Please let this be a joke, I'm not going to let you do this again. The people playing during these times are playing because they want to play ranked at that time knowing what it will be like (queue and in game) don't take it away from a whole region. I mostly play in those times because of my sleeping pattern, removing the curfew was the best thing. pls don't bring it back

replies.body: There's nothing on the [Service Status Page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce) about it. Where did you get that screenshot?

I can't seem to find that service status in the client or on the Service Status page; however, something to keep in mind is that all-day Ranked Solo/Duo Queue is currently in effect on a trial basis only. They've been collecting the numbers and gathering feedback, and if they believe that matchmaking is problematic at specific hours, it's understandable why they would disable it at those times. 

If you feel strongly that Ranked Solo/Duo Queue should be enabled at all times, I encourage you to post your sentiments in the [**Queue Schedule**](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZzQR1haM-queue-schedule-updated) thread! Cheers, mate!
